name: Dash Down
description:
Gameplay

Bricks of yellow, read, blue, and green fall from the sky. Click the stack to match the primary stack color to that of the falling brick. As you progress blocks fall faster, and the number of stacks increase.

Dash Down will test not only your coordination and multitasking but your mousing speed. Can you get to 20? 40? More?

Dash Down plays best on iOS and Android where rapid tapping will save the day. Hit your favorite app store below to find it (coming soon).
